attributes.action: Free Bus Passes for the whole UK 🇬🇧 at 60, and OPTION to retire STILL at 60!!
attributes.additional_details:
It is not our fault that the government failed to save the monies we have paid all our lives through NI and taxes. Therefore, it is unfair that we are penalised for their short comings.  Hard working British Tax Payers worked hard and planned all their lives expecting to have a pension at 60 for women, 65 for men!!  Retirement is not a benefit we have paid for it as Hard Working Tax Payers....! 
Fair deal Pension for all British People especially the WORKING CLASS we have PAID FOR IT ALREADY!
attributes.background: Free Bus Passes for the whole UK 🇬🇧 at 60, not just Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.   Plus CHOICE to retire at 60 for Men and Women WITH A PENSION  giving PRIORITY TO ALL THOSE ALREADY DIAGNOSED WITH CHRONIC ILLNESSES as their lifetime will be limited.
